FirstMessage: You have found your first hidden junimo, find all five to wake up the Magic Junimo!
FoundMessage: You have found hidden junimo {{TotalFound}} of 5, find them all to wake up the Magic Junimo!
LastMessage: You have found all hidden junimo's and awoken the Magic Junimo, it will reach your farm tomorrow.
EmptyMessage: The junimo that was hidden here has since moved on.
